about_the_game: 《Origin》is a 3D magic dark wind tower defense game. On the basis of the classic tower defense game, the game increases the confrontation between heroes and monsters. At the same time, the game also changes the way of resource acquisition and increases the competition for resources, which makes this game break the shackles of the traditional tower defense game. In addition, the game has also set up the playing method of card cultivation, a variety of powerful cards, which can be arranged and combined by you, greatly enhancing the strategic nature of the game. Exquisite 3D modeling makes the characters and scenes more real. The exquisite picture quality makes you feel different from the tower defense!
detailed_description: 《Origin》is a 3D magic dark wind tower defense game. On the basis of the classic tower defense game, the game increases the confrontation between heroes and monsters. At the same time, the game also changes the way of resource acquisition and increases the competition for resources, which makes this game break the shackles of the traditional tower defense game. In addition, the game has also set up the playing method of card cultivation, a variety of powerful cards, which can be arranged and combined by you, greatly enhancing the strategic nature of the game. Exquisite 3D modeling makes the characters and scenes more real. The exquisite picture quality makes you feel different from the tower defense!
developers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY CO.,LTD
name: 勇者起源

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 2GB or Radeon HD 7770 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played

publishers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY CO.,LTD
short_description: 《Origin》is a 3D magic dark wind tower defense game. A variety of powerful cards can be combined at your disposal, greatly enhancing the game's strategy. Exquisite 3D modeling makes the characters and scenes more real. The exquisite picture quality makes you feel different from the tower defense!
